org.smooks.cartridges.javabean

Class BeanMapExpressionEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smooks.engine.expression.MVELExpressionEvaluator
      • org.smooks.cartridges.javabean.BeanMapExpressionEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.smooks.api.expression.ExecutionContextExpressionEvaluator, org.smooks.api.expression.ExpressionEvaluator

    public class BeanMapExpressionEvaluator
extends org.smooks.engine.expression.MVELExpressionEvaluator
implements org.smooks.api.expression.ExecutionContextExpressionEvaluator
    Javabean Cartridge bean Map expression evaluator.

    Evaluates MVEL expressions on java objects bound to the supplied ExecutionContext via the BeanContext.

    Cab be used to selectively target resources based on the contents of the java objects bound to the supplied ExecutionContext via the BeanContext.

    The special EC variable gives access to the EditingContext.

    Author:
    tom.fennelly@gmail.com
